<font color='#9B30FF' size='16'>Grants Treasure of the Shadow Realm (<textformat leftmargin='1' rightmargin='1'>[1]</textformat>) on death.</font>

A strange item retrieved from a Shadow Orb.
Cold to the touch, when this item is held, your grip on reality may begin to slip.
